category.name: Shorts
category.title: Men's Shorts
category.description: Don’t mind us – just hitting you with an edit of options for your lower-half, a.k.a men’s shorts. Topman’s keeping us covered for Winter sun with men’s linen shorts and denim shorts, while Jack & Jones has gotchu (from the knee up, anyway) with a selection of chino shorts and convenient cargos for when the vibes call for smart-casj. Even ASOS DESIGN’s got men’s smart shorts and men’s tailored shorts offering serious legs-out potential – score points in cropped, longline or oversized styles. Big on branding? Peep men’s designer shorts from Lacoste or grab yourself a pair of men’s jersey shorts from Nike, ideal for kicking back or heading to the gym. Now, where’s the checkout?

products.name: ASOS DESIGN shorter length denim shorts in 90s mid wash with rip detail and raw hem

comments.title: SO CUTE!!
comments.content: they are everything I wanted them to be and more so cute!

comments.title: SHORTS
comments.content: the fabric could be made a bit better and stronger

comments.title: HOOCHIE SHORTS
comments.content: I love these shorts, exactly what I wanted and the cut on the legs actually is really smart. It doesn’t restrict your movement like a straight cut would. Great shorts

comments.title: GREAT FIT
comments.content: Great fit! great fit! I would recommend these shorts to all of my friends

comments.title: RUNS WAY SMALL EVEN BUYING SIZE UP
comments.content: runs way small even after going a size up in preparation for probable problems re: international ship.

comments.title: HOOCHIE DADDY SHORTS
comments.content: The ultimate thirst trap for guys with muscular legs. 10/10

comments.title: RIPPED FIRST WEAR
comments.content: Wore them for half a day and they ripped from the bottom fray to the basically the waist band ended up resembling a mini skirt

comments.title: GOOD FOR PRICE
comments.content: They’re cute. They fit well. They’re not amazing in quality, but I can pair them with nicer pieces to make a cool outfit.

comments.title: TERRIBLE QUALITY.
comments.content: The shorts looks great but the quality is poor. I used once, yes once and got destroyed. I really want my money back or return this .

comments.title: LOVE SHORT SHORTS
comments.content: A better quality than I was expecting. Love thus fit. Just wish it cam in a bkeached out or acid wash.

comments.title: GREAT SHORTS!
comments.content: A little shorter than expected, but great quality and perfect for summer

comments.title: LOOK CUTE
comments.content: These are very fun. The fit is a little weird. Nice and fitted around the butt and thighs but the waist is a little loose.

comments.title: FITS LIKE A GLOVE
comments.content: Love that the shorts are actual denim and not stretchy. I was giving legs for daysss in these shorts.

comments.title: IT SUCKED
comments.content: The shorts ripped one I sat down didn’t even get to wear once

comments.title: SHORT WILL RIP WHILE WEARING IT.
comments.content: I bought it a month ago and it keeps ripping while I’m wearing it.

comments.title: LOVE THESE SHORTS
comments.content: Exactly what I was looking for. I am typically 31-32, but ordered at 34 and they fit perfect. Definitely size up one.

comments.title: LOVED THEM BUT THEY SPLIT THE FIRST TIME I SAT DOWN
comments.content: Too bad. They're really nice but not durable. Really took me back to the 80s.

comments.title: RIPPED ON FIRST WEAR!! UNWEARABLE NOW!
comments.content:
Seriously if you have any amount of meat on your legs at all — don’t get this. You can’t move in them! I sat down in my car and the leg ripped all the way up to the waist. They’re super cute but now unwearable.

comments.content: I was so excited to get these! However they just run small so I couldn’t fit them! Good quality but just not a good fit if you are on the thicker side

comments.title: POOR FIT
comments.content: Was a different colour then it was online, poor fit

comments.title: THESE WERE HUGE
comments.content:
Everyone who wrote a review said that these were extremely small. These tan extremely large on me. I typically wear a 28 and I went up to 30. I was swimming in them.

comments.content: Great boooty shorts. Excited for my concert now that I have these!

comments.title: LOVE THESE SHORTS!
comments.content: Great fit and feel good, my quads look great with how they fit around my legs

comments.title: SUPER FUN

comments.title: CUTE SHORTS BUT EITHER TOO BIG OR TOO SMALL
comments.content:
I bought two different sizes of the shorts and one size was entirely way too big and I had so much room in the waist on the back side of my shorts. And when I ordered the smaller size it was way too tight to where I could bearly get the zipper zipped.. I wish there was an in between the two sizes but there isn’t. I believe I got the 32 and the 30 wish their was a 31

comments.title: GRAT SHORTS

comments.title: GREAT FIT

comments.title: THEY RIP TOO EASY
comments.content: If you are thick thighs go up 2 sizes .. I’m a 28 waist n I bend down and they ripped n my willie fell out

comments.title: EXACTLY LIKE THE PHOTO!
comments.content: I love these shorts. They are exactly what I wanted!

comments.title: MAKE SURE YOU SKIP LEG DAY
comments.content: If you’ve ever done a squat, lunge, or quite frankly just bent over: AVOID the frayed hem means these rip off ich the slightest movements

comments.title: TOO SHORT
comments.content:
I bought these and unfortunately they seemed MUCH shorter on my legs than on the model’s. I am 6’1” and I believe the model is stated to be 6’2” but proportionally they looks like briefs on me compared to shorts on him. Returned.

comments.title: RIPPED ON FIRST WEAR
comments.content:
Nice looking product, but the frayed hem is fragile – the leg split of first wear where there's a notch in the hem. Didn't return them as I don't think it's a fault as such and they're arguably still wearable, but I wouldn't rush to recommend these.
Read More

comments.title: SIZING OFF
comments.content: Runs far too small, had to send back. Denim has very little stretch

comments.title: GREAT FIT PREFECT TO FINISHED OFF MY FESTIVAL LOOK OFF THIS WEEKEND
comments.content: great fit prefect to finished off my festival look off this weekend

comments.title: HORRIBLE FIT
comments.content:
I went a size up bc they were short shorts, but when i tried them on the jean material had absolutely no stretch or give. I couldn’t even sit down in them. If you have thighs DO NOT BUY these shorts.

comments.title: NO STRETCH
comments.content: The shorts are cute and I ordered 2 sizes and not either one fit! They have no stretch at all! Needless to say they got returned.

comments.title: TOO TIGHT
comments.content:
Bought my usual size 32 waist, and I couldn’t fit in them! No stretch at all. While the design is nice, the quality is very cheap amd leaves a lot to be desired. I wouldn’t waste your money.

comments.title: OK BUT
comments.content:
These are ok but the sizing is confusing, im a 30W and had to get a 34W in these shorts but they still dont feel comfortable to wear still slightly tight. Only kept them after changing the size once because they are decent jean shorts.

comments.content: I love the colour and the length but mens asos jeans and jean shorts always have hide unflattering back pockets…

comments.title: POOR DENIM QUALITY
comments.content:
These shorts looked really cool in the image, but the colour didn't look the same in real life and the quality of the denim was terrible. They felt thin and cheap. They also looked a lot shorter on than they do in the picture!

comments.title: SO TIGHT
comments.content: Bought in the size I buy all my shorts and couldn’t even fit one leg in!

comments.title: SIZING WAY OFF
comments.content: I ordered a size 38, and that’s what I received, but it fits like a 32 or 34 - entirely too small to wear.

comments.title: I STRETCH
comments.content: Returned these purely because I found others at Asos that contain stretch and therefore fit better. Nice style though

comments.title: THE MOST STYLISH DENIM SHORTS OF ALL TIMES !!
comments.content:
This peace is loud and original at the same time. It’s super stylish trendy and basic. It’s comfortable and will get you lots of compliments. Just man up and be bold a bit. The confidence this piece will give you is outrageous. You can have like 100 outfits with this shorts. I love it and like no other denim shorts I ever owned.

comments.content: Exactly what I was looking for and a great fit! I hope they come in other colors.

comments.title: TIGHT ON BIG THIGH GUYS
comments.content: I would size up one time if you got bigger thighs. Trust. Other than that it is great shorts. Fade after a couple of washes.

comments.title: MEH
comments.content: Nice material but the fitting and size is not right

comments.title: EXACTLY AS EXPECTED!
comments.content: It looks like the picture good color and quality and fits great. Definelty recommend.

comments.title: GREAT
comments.content: Nice comfortable fit great material great price cant fall off

comments.title: PRETTY GOOD.
comments.content:
these shorts are pretty good. fit in the waist is good. I've got pretty thick legs and the shorts are barely skinny, but workable. they're a lot too long however, and just tight enough to be unable to cuff, so they're a bit uncomfortable rubbing against the back of my knees. otherwise just fine.

comments.title: GREAT FEATURES
comments.content: I like them , they fit just the way I wanted true to size

products.name: ASOS DESIGN shorter length denim shorts in midwash with rip detail and raw hem

comments.title: SEXY AND SHORT
comments.content: Perfect short summer denim shorts. They wear great and wash well too.

comments.title: PERFECT
comments.content: As a person with big hips and a butt lol these shorts are a great fit and great look! Definitely worked for what I wanted them for .

comments.title: FAV SHORTS
comments.content: These are literally some of my favorite shorts I’ve ever purchased! I ordered all 3 colors and wear them almost everyday!

comments.title: BELT LOOPS BROKE
comments.content:
After wearing two times, belt loops broke off from seams (2 of them). Not that big of a deal, can re-sew them, but annoying as this pair of Jean shorts were brand new. Also I was just pulling up my shorts slightly via the belt loops, nothing crazy. Other than that, fit pretty well and stylish.

comments.title: WAY TOO BIG
comments.content: I ordered a 30 waist and they fell off my body completely buttoned and zipped.

comments.title: AWFUL

comments.title: RIPPED SHORTS

comments.content:
This is yet another item from Asos that looks nothing like it does on the app. So misleading, seems like this is a ploy by Asos in the hope they get people like me that can’t be bothered with the hassle of returning the item. Not a good approach at all.

comfortable, stretchy, fits correctly. Can fold up the bottoms and they don't just roll back down. Good simple buy. You get what you think you're getting (and that's a good thing)

These shorts look cute, but the fabric is very rigid and has no give to it at all. With the tight style, this means your leg doesn’t have enough room to move. And then with the rolled up part, it’s even more stiff and uncomfortable.
